message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business.  It's a unique item that aligns perfectly with your company's goals.  While I value this product at $1,000,000, I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000.  This is a significant discount, and I'm confident you'll recognize the tremendous value it offers.  Please let me know your decision by [Date/Time].
